verses.verse: Now after <S%G3796><s%> the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> as it began to dawn <S%G2020><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the first <S%G1520><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G243><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to see <S%G2334><s%> the tomb. <S%G5028><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> an <S%G4578><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the sky, <S%G3772><s%> and came <S%G4334><s%> and rolled away <S%G617><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the door, <S%G2374><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1883><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

His <S%G846><s%> appearance <S%G2397><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> lightning, <S%G796><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> clothing <S%G1742><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> snow. <S%G5510><s%>
For <S%G575><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of him, <S%G846><s%> the guards <S%G5083><s%> shook, <S%G4579><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> dead men. <S%G3498><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> the women, <S%G1135><s%> "Don't <S%G3361><s%> be afraid, <S%G5399><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you seek <S%G2212><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who has been crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

He is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he has risen, <S%G1453><s%> just like <S%G2531><s%> he said. <S%G2036><s%> Come, <S%G1205><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> was lying. <S%G2749><s%>

Go <S%G4198><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> <S%G1453><s%> 'He has risen from <S%G575><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> he goes before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> you will see <S%G3700><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>' Behold, <S%G3700><s%> I have told <S%G2036><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>"

They <S%G2532><s%> departed <S%G1831><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the tomb <S%G3419><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%> and ran <S%G5143><s%> to bring <S%G518><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> word. <S%G518><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> they went <S%G4198><s%> to tell <S%G518><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> met <S%G528><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Rejoice! <S%G5463><s%>" They came <S%G4334><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> took hold <S%G2902><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> feet, <S%G4228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G5399><s%> afraid. <S%G5399><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> tell <S%G518><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should go <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and there <S%G2546><s%> they will see <S%G3700><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> while <S%G4198><s%> they <S%G846><s%> were going, <S%G4198><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the guards <S%G2892><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the things that had happened. <S%G1096><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> they were assembled <S%G4863><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the elders, <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> had taken <S%G2983><s%> counsel, <S%G4824><s%> they gave <S%G1325><s%> a large <S%G2425><s%> amount of silver <S%G694><s%> to the soldiers, <S%G4757><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Say that his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> by night, <S%G3571><s%> and stole <S%G2813><s%> him <S%G846><s%> away while <S%G2837><s%> we <S%G2257><s%> slept. <S%G2837><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> comes <S%G191><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the governor <S%G2232><s%>'s ears, <S%G191><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> will persuade <S%G3982><s%> him <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> make you <S%G5209><s%> free of worry. <S%G275><s%>"

So <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> the money <S%G694><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they were told. <S%G3778><s%> This saying <S%G3056><s%> was spread <S%G1310><s%> abroad among <S%G3844><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and continues until <S%G3360><s%> this day. <S%G4594><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3101><s%> eleven <S%G1733><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the mountain <S%G3735><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had sent <S%G5021><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>
When <S%G2532><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they bowed down <S%G4352><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> doubted. <S%G1365><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to them and spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "All <S%G3956><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> has been given <S%G1325><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

Go, <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G3767><s%> make disciples <S%G3100><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> nations, <S%G1484><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%>

teaching <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to observe <S%G5083><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3745><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> commanded <S%G1781><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> always, <S%G2250><s%> even to <S%G2193><s%> the end <S%G4930><s%> of the age. <S%G165><s%>" Amen. <S%G281><s%>
